Miami_Beach.Omni International Mall:
Omni International Mall was a shopping mall that opened in February 1977 in the northern environs of Downtown Miami's Omni District in Miami-Dade County, Florida, United States.
The mall was built in 1977, attached to an existing Jordan Marsh store, with J.C. Penney as the other anchor. It was a mixed-use complex, combining a traditional retail mall with offices and hotel space.
